metadata.Title: CVE-2020-21697 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A heap-use-after-free in the mpeg_mux_write_packet function in libavformat/mpegenc.c of FFmpeg 4.2 allows to cause a denial of service (DOS) via a crafted avi file.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
vice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
